title: Automated Social Media Bot with Puppeteer
description: Build a bot to automate social media interactions, posts, and content extraction

attack_chain.title: Launch Browser with Stealth
attack_chain.command: const puppeteer = require('puppeteer'); const browser = await puppeteer.launch({headless: false, args: ['--no-sandbox', '--disable-setuid-sandbox']}); const page = await browser.newPage();

attack_chain.title: Set User Agent and Viewport
attack_chain.command: await page.setUserAgent('Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) Chrome/120.0.0.0'); await page.setViewport({width: 1366, height: 768});

attack_chain.title: Navigate to Login Page
attack_chain.explanation: Load social media login page and wait for form

attack_chain.title: Complete Authentication
attack_chain.command: await page.waitForSelector('input[type="password"]'); await page.type('input[type="password"]', 'SecurePassword123', {delay: 120}); await page.click('button[data-testid="LoginForm_Login_Button"]'); await page.waitForNavigation();

attack_chain.title: Search for Target Content
attack_chain.command: await page.waitForSelector('input[data-testid="SearchBox_Search_Input"]'); await page.type('input[data-testid="SearchBox_Search_Input"]', '#automation'); await page.keyboard.press('Enter'); await page.waitForSelector('article');
attack_chain.explanation: Use search to find relevant posts

attack_chain.title: Extract Post Data
attack_chain.command: const posts = await page.$$eval('article', articles => articles.slice(0, 5).map(a => ({text: a.querySelector('[data-testid="tweetText"]')?.textContent, author: a.querySelector('[data-testid="User-Name"]')?.textContent}))); console.log('Extracted posts:', posts.length);

attack_chain.title: Like Posts Automatically
attack_chain.command: const likeButtons = await page.$$('[data-testid="like"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(3, likeButtons.length); i++) { await likeButtons[i].click(); await page.waitForTimeout(2000 + Math.random() * 3000); }

attack_chain.title: Compose and Post Tweet
attack_chain.command: await page.click('[data-testid="SideNav_NewTweet_Button"]'); await page.waitForSelector('[data-testid="tweetTextarea_0"]'); await page.type('[data-testid="tweetTextarea_0"]', 'Automated post via Puppeteer! #bot #automation', {delay: 80}); await page.click('[data-testid="tweetButtonInline"]'); await page.waitForTimeout(3000);

attack_chain.title: Save Session and Logout
attack_chain.command: const cookies = await page.cookies(); require('fs').writeFileSync('/tmp/session.json', JSON.stringify(cookies)); console.log('Session saved'); await page.click('[data-testid="AccountSwitcher_Logout_Button"]'); await browser.close();
attack_chain.explanation: Export cookies for session reuse, close browser
